sqlMap.select:
/* KidsGroundDao.selectKidsGroundFaciltyList */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, AA.* FROM ( SELECT FCLTY_SN ,FCLTY_NO ,FCLTY_NM ,ADRES1 ,ADRES2 ,INSTL_DT ,PLCSTRA ,OPER_SE ,AREA_CL ,PUBLIC_SE ,INOUT_SE ,FCLTY_SE ,INSTL_YEAR ,SCHUL_CLSF ,OFCDC ,PCPSKL ,FOND_SE ,SCHUL_STTUS ,FCLTY_TY ,AR_TOTAL ,AR_NRTR_ROOM ,AR_BATH_ROOM ,AR_TOILET ,AR_COOK_ROOM ,AR_OFFM ,AR_MDLRT_ROOM ,AR_ETC ,AR_PLY_ROOM ,RESIST_DT ,REGISTER_ID ,UPDT_DT ,UPDT_ID ,AREA_DETAIL_CL ,AR_ABOVE_AT ,CRTFC_JDGMN_DE ,INSPCT_JDGMN_DE FROM TC_FCLTY
FCLTY_TY = #searchArea#
FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
PLCSTRA LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY FCLTY_SN DESC )AA )Z
WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

/* KidsGroundDao.selectKidsGroundFaciltyListCnt */ SELECT count(*) FROM TC_FCLTY
FCLTY_TY = #searchArea#
FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
PLCSTRA LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

/* KidsGroundDao.detailKidsGroundCurrent */ SELECT FCLTY_SN ,FCLTY_NO ,FCLTY_NM ,ADRES1 ,ADRES2 ,FCLTY_TY ,AREA_CL ,AREA_DETAIL_CL ,INSTL_DT ,OFCDC ,PCPSKL ,FOND_SE ,SCHUL_STTUS FROM TC_FCLTY WHERE FCLTY_SN = #fcltySn#

/* KidsGroundDao.selectKidsGroundFaciltyExcelList */ SELECT FCLTY_SN ,FCLTY_NO ,FCLTY_NM ,ADRES1 ,ADRES2 ,INSTL_DT ,PLCSTRA ,OPER_SE ,AREA_CL ,PUBLIC_SE ,INOUT_SE ,FCLTY_SE ,INSTL_YEAR ,SCHUL_CLSF ,OFCDC ,PCPSKL ,FOND_SE ,SCHUL_STTUS ,FCLTY_TY ,AR_TOTAL ,AR_NRTR_ROOM ,AR_BATH_ROOM ,AR_TOILET ,AR_COOK_ROOM ,AR_OFFM ,AR_MDLRT_ROOM ,AR_ETC ,AR_PLY_ROOM ,RESIST_DT ,REGISTER_ID ,UPDT_DT ,UPDT_ID ,AREA_DETAIL_CL ,AR_ABOVE_AT ,CRTFC_JDGMN_DE ,INSPCT_JDGMN_DE FROM TC_FCLTY
FCLTY_TY = #searchArea#
FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
PLCSTRA LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY FCLTY_SN DESC
sqlMap.insert: /* KidsGroundDao.insertFcltyData */ INSERT INTO TC_FCLTY ( FCLTY_SN ,FCLTY_NO ,FCLTY_NM ,ADRES1 ,ADRES2 ,INSTL_DT ,PLCSTRA ,OPER_SE ,AREA_CL ,PUBLIC_SE ,INOUT_SE ,FCLTY_SE ,INSTL_YEAR ,SCHUL_CLSF ,OFCDC ,PCPSKL ,FOND_SE ,SCHUL_STTUS ,FCLTY_TY ,AR_TOTAL ,AR_NRTR_ROOM ,AR_BATH_ROOM ,AR_TOILET ,AR_COOK_ROOM ,AR_OFFM ,AR_MDLRT_ROOM ,AR_ETC ,AR_PLY_ROOM ,RESIST_DT ,REGISTER_ID ,UPDT_DT ,UPDT_ID ,AREA_DETAIL_CL ,AR_ABOVE_AT) VALUES( #fcltySn# ,#fcltyNo# ,#fcltyNm# ,#adres1# ,#adres2# ,#instlDt# ,#plcstra# ,#operSe# ,#areaCl# ,#publicSe# ,#inoutSe# ,#fcltySe# ,#instlYaar# ,#schulClsf# ,#ofcdc# ,#pcpskl# ,#fondSe# ,#schulSttus# ,#fcltyTy# ,#arTotal# ,#arNrtrRoom# ,#arBathRoom# ,#arToilet# ,#arCookRoom# ,#arOffm# ,#arMdlrtRoom# ,#arEtc# ,#arPlyRoom# ,#resistDt# ,#resisterId# ,#updtDt# ,#udptId# ,#areaDetailCl# ,#arAboveAt# )
sqlMap.select:
/* KidsGroundDao.selectKidsGroundRelief */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, AA.* FROM ( SELECT CRTFC_SN ,POSTPNE_AT ,APPLC_YEAR ,CRTFC_AT ,CRTFC_DT ,CRTFC_NO ,FCLTY_NM ,RPRSNTV ,LOCPLC ,CRTFC_BGNDE ,CRTFC_ENDDE ,FCLTY_SN ,INSTL_DT ,OPER_SE ,AREA_CL ,AREA_DETAIL_CL ,FCLTY_TY ,REGIST_DT ,REGISTER_ID ,UPDT_DT ,UPDT_ID FROM TC_FCLTY_CRTFC_RESULT
FCLTY_TY = #searchArea#
FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
CRTFC_NO LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY CRTFC_SN DESC )AA )Z
WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

/* KidsGroundDao.selectKidsGroundReliefCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TC_FCLTY_CRTFC_RESULT
FCLTY_TY = #searchArea#
FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
CRTFC_NO LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

/* KidsGroundDao.selectKidsGroundReliefExcel */ SELECT CRTFC_SN ,POSTPNE_AT ,APPLC_YEAR ,CRTFC_AT ,CRTFC_DT ,CRTFC_NO ,FCLTY_NM ,RPRSNTV ,LOCPLC ,CRTFC_BGNDE ,CRTFC_ENDDE ,FCLTY_SN ,INSTL_DT ,OPER_SE ,AREA_CL ,AREA_DETAIL_CL ,FCLTY_TY ,REGIST_DT ,REGISTER_ID ,UPDT_DT ,UPDT_ID FROM TC_FCLTY_CRTFC_RESULT
FCLTY_TY = #searchArea#
FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
CRTFC_NO LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY CRTFC_SN DESC

/* KidsGroundDao.detailKidsGroundRelief */ SELECT CRTFC_SN ,POSTPNE_AT ,APPLC_YEAR ,CRTFC_AT ,CRTFC_DT ,CRTFC_NO ,FCLTY_NM ,RPRSNTV ,LOCPLC ,CRTFC_BGNDE ,CRTFC_ENDDE ,FCLTY_SN ,INSTL_DT ,OPER_SE ,AREA_CL ,AREA_DETAIL_CL ,FCLTY_TY ,REGIST_DT ,REGISTER_ID ,UPDT_DT ,UPDT_ID FROM TC_FCLTY_CRTFC_RESULT WHERE CRTFC_SN = #crtfcSn# ORDER BY CRTFC_SN DESC
/* KidsGroundDao.selectCheckMaxCount */ SELECT NVL(MAX(aa.BACKUP_CNT),0) FROM TC_FCLTY_BACKUP aa
sqlMap.insert: /* KidsGroundDao.insertBackUpFcltyData */ INSERT INTO TC_FCLTY_BACKUP( FCLTY_SN ,FCLTY_NO ,FCLTY_NM ,ADRES1 ,ADRES2 ,INSTL_DT ,PLCSTRA ,OPER_SE ,AREA_CL ,PUBLIC_SE ,INOUT_SE ,FCLTY_SE ,INSTL_YEAR ,SCHUL_CLSF ,OFCDC ,PCPSKL ,FOND_SE ,SCHUL_STTUS ,FCLTY_TY ,AR_TOTAL ,AR_NRTR_ROOM ,AR_BATH_ROOM ,AR_TOILET ,AR_COOK_ROOM ,AR_OFFM ,AR_MDLRT_ROOM ,AR_ETC ,AR_PLY_ROOM ,RESIST_DT ,REGISTER_ID ,UPDT_DT ,UPDT_ID ,AREA_DETAIL_CL ,AR_ABOVE_AT ,CRTFC_JDGMN_DE ,INSPCT_JDGMN_DE ,BACKUP_CNT )SELECT FCLTY_SN ,FCLTY_NO ,FCLTY_NM ,ADRES1 ,ADRES2 ,INSTL_DT ,PLCSTRA ,OPER_SE ,AREA_CL ,PUBLIC_SE ,INOUT_SE ,FCLTY_SE ,INSTL_YEAR ,SCHUL_CLSF ,OFCDC ,PCPSKL ,FOND_SE ,SCHUL_STTUS ,FCLTY_TY ,AR_TOTAL ,AR_NRTR_ROOM ,AR_BATH_ROOM ,AR_TOILET ,AR_COOK_ROOM ,AR_OFFM ,AR_MDLRT_ROOM ,AR_ETC ,AR_PLY_ROOM ,RESIST_DT ,REGISTER_ID ,UPDT_DT ,UPDT_ID ,AREA_DETAIL_CL ,AR_ABOVE_AT ,CRTFC_JDGMN_DE ,INSPCT_JDGMN_DE ,#backupCnt# FROM TC_FCLTY
sqlMap.select: /* KidsGroundDao.selectBackUpChkCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TC_FCLTY_BACKUP WHERE BACKUP_CNT = #backupCnt#
sqlMap.delete: /* KidsGroundDao.deleteFcltyBackUp */ DELETE FROM TC_FCLTY_BACKUP WHERE BACKUP_CNT = #backupCnt#
sqlMap.select: /* KidsGroundDao.selectCheckMaxCountReleif */ SELECT NVL(MAX(aa.BACKUP_CNT),0) FROM TC_FCLTY_CRTFC_RESULT_BACKUP aa
sqlMap.insert: /* KidsGroundDao.insertBackUpFcltyReliefData */ INSERT INTO TC_FCLTY_CRTFC_RESULT_BACKUP( CRTFC_SN ,POSTPNE_AT ,APPLC_YEAR ,CRTFC_AT ,CRTFC_DT ,CRTFC_NO ,FCLTY_NM ,RPRSNTV ,LOCPLC ,CRTFC_BGNDE ,CRTFC_ENDDE ,FCLTY_SN ,INSTL_DT ,OPER_SE ,AREA_CL ,AREA_DETAIL_CL ,FCLTY_TY ,REGIST_DT ,REGISTER_ID ,UPDT_DT ,UPDT_ID ,BACKUP_CNT )SELECT CRTFC_SN ,POSTPNE_AT ,APPLC_YEAR ,CRTFC_AT ,CRTFC_DT ,CRTFC_NO ,FCLTY_NM ,RPRSNTV ,LOCPLC ,CRTFC_BGNDE ,CRTFC_ENDDE ,FCLTY_SN ,INSTL_DT ,OPER_SE ,AREA_CL ,AREA_DETAIL_CL ,FCLTY_TY ,REGIST_DT ,REGISTER_ID ,UPDT_DT ,UPDT_ID ,#backupCnt# FROM TC_FCLTY_CRTFC_RESULT_BACKUP
sqlMap.select: /* KidsGroundDao.selectBackUpReliefChkCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TC_FCLTY_CRTFC_RESULT_BACKUP WHERE BACKUP_CNT = #backupCnt#
sqlMap.delete: /* KidsGroundDao.deleteFcltyReliefBackUp */ DELETE FROM TC_FCLTY_CRTFC_RESULT_BACKUP WHERE BACKUP_CNT = #backupCnt#
